files.patch:
@@ -122,0 +122,5 @@
+            checkClass(loader, "NestedUnion",
+                checkField("x", int.class, 0),
+                checkField("y", int.class, 4, "$anon$0"),
+                checkField("z", int.class, 4, "$anon$0")
+            );
